001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationEnum;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
013
014import java.math.BigInteger;
015import java.util.Locale;
016
017/**
018 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
019 */
020/**
021 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
022 *
023
024 *
025 * <br>
026 *
027 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}, opCode 121, size 11
028 *
029 * <br>
030 *
031 * 
032 * <table border='1'>
033 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>121</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>11</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>variableSize</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CURRENT_STATUS}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * </table>
041 */@MessageProps(
042    opCode=121,
043    size=11, // or 10
044    variableSize=true,
045    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
046    characteristic=Characteristic.CURRENT_STATUS,
047    request= MalfunctionStatusRequest.class
048)
049public class MalfunctionStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage implements NotificationEnum {
050    
051    private long codeA;
052    private long codeB;
053    private byte[] remaining;
054
055    private String errorString;
056    
057    public MalfunctionStatusResponse() {}
058    
059    public MalfunctionStatusResponse(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
060        this.cargo = buildCargo(codeA, codeB, remaining);
061        parse(cargo);
062        
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * <table border="1">
067     * <caption>Parsed fields for MalfunctionStatusResponse:</caption>
068     * <tr><td><code>codeA</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td><code>codeB</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
070     * <tr><td><code>remaining</code></td><td><code>Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8)</code></td></tr>
071     * <tr><td><code>errorString</code></td><td><code>getErrorString()</code></td></tr>
072     * </table>
073     */
074    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
075        Validate.isTrue(raw.length >= props().size());
076        this.cargo = raw;
077        this.codeA = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
078        this.codeB = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4);
079        this.remaining = Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8);
080        this.errorString = getErrorString();
081        
082    }
083
084    
085    /**
086     * <table border="1">
087     * <caption>Byte layout for MalfunctionStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
088     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
089     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
097     * </table>
098     */
099    public static byte[] buildCargo(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
100        return Bytes.combine(
101            Bytes.toUint32(codeA),
102            Bytes.toUint32(codeB),
103            remaining
104        );
105    }
106
107    public long getCodeA() {
108        return codeA;
109    }
110
111    public long getCodeB() {
112        return codeB;
113    }
114
115    public byte[] getRemaining() {
116        return remaining;
117    }
118
119    public String getErrorString() {
120        if (!hasMalfunction()) return "";
121        return String.format(Locale.US, "%d-%#x", getCodeA(), getCodeB());
122    }
123
124    public long[][] IGNORABLE_CODES = new long[][]{
125            {0, 0}, // empty
126            {3, 8230}, // 3-0x2026
127            {18, 8311}, // 18-0x2077 (codeA=18, codeB=8311, remaining={2,3,10}
128            {26, 8322}, // 26-0x2082 (cargo: 26,0,0,0,-126,32,0,0,1,1,0)
129    };
130
131    /**
132     * If the provided response ACTUALLY appears to be a pump malfunction,
133     * and not just a matching ID from a concurrent alert or alarm code.
134     *
135     * @param otherMessages other {@link NotificationMessage} implementations (e.g.
136     *                      {@link AlarmStatusResponse}, {@link AlertStatusResponse}) which are also
137     *                      present as concurrent notifications along with this reported malfunction
138     * @return if the malfunction code appears to be valid due to not having any other matching
139     *         concurrent notifications
140     */
141    public boolean hasMalfunction(NotificationMessage... otherMessages) {
142        for (long[] code : IGNORABLE_CODES) {
143            if (code[0] == getCodeA() && code[1] == getCodeB()) {
144                return false;
145            }
146        }
147
148        if (matchesKnownIds(otherMessages)) {
149            return false;
150        }
151
152        return true;
153    }
154
155    public boolean matchesKnownIds(NotificationMessage... otherMessages) {
156        if (otherMessages == null) {
157            return false;
158        }
159
160        for (NotificationMessage message : otherMessages) {
161            if (message.notificationIds().contains((int) getCodeA())) {
162                return true;
163            }
164        }
165
166        return false;
167    }
168
169
170    @Override
171    public int size() {
172        return (hasMalfunction() &&
173                !StringUtils.isBlank(getErrorString())) ? 1 : 0;
174    }
175
176    @Override
177    public int getId() {
178        return (int) getCodeA();
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public String getDescription() {
183        return getErrorString();
184    }
185}
